ch.epfl.biop.registration

Interface Registration<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of the image to register ( ImagePlus / SourceAndConverter, what else ? )
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ExternalABBARegistrationPlugin, IABBARegistrationPlugin
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AffineRegistration, AffineTransformedSourceWrapperRegistration, AffineTransformSourceAndConverterRegistration, CenterZeroRegistration, Elastix2DAffineRegistration, Elastix2DSplineRegistration, MirrorXRegistration, RealTransformSourceAndConverterRegistration, SacBigWarp2DRegistration, SimpleRegistrationWrapper, SourceAndConverterRegistration

    public interface Registration<T>
    Most upstream

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void abort()
      Function called when a registration is cancelled while being processed
      boolean edit()
      Blocking function which is called when the user wants to manually edit the result of the registration
      default String getExceptionMessage()
      Can be called after register() return false in order to get a more meaningful explanation
      Map<String,String> getRegistrationParameters()
      For serialization and reproducibility
      default String getRegistrationTypeName()
      Used for serialisation
      String getTransform()
      This function is used to: - save the registration into a json file - store transiently the state of a registration to cancel the edition of a transform, if needed
      RealTransform getTransformAsRealTransform()
      If the transform can be returned as a serializable RealTransform object, this can be used to serialize the successive registrations as a RealTransformSequence object, or even, if all transformations are invertible, as a InvertibleRealTransformSequence object
      T getTransformedImageMovingToFixed(T img)
      Function which takes an input moving image, transform it according to the result of the registration (transformation), and returns it
      ch.epfl.biop.java.utilities.roi.types.RealPointList getTransformedPtsFixedToMoving(ch.epfl.biop.java.utilities.roi.types.RealPointList pts)
      Reverse transforms a list of points.
      boolean isRegistrationDone()
      Flag functions which serves to know whether the result of the registration is available.
      boolean register()
      Blocking function which performs the registration
      void resetRegistration()
      Sets the state of the registration to not done Called when the registration needs to be rerun for real instead of just restored
      void setFixedImage(T fimg)
      Sets the fixed image
      void setFixedMask(T fimg_mask)
      Optional - sets the fixed image mask
      void setMovingImage(T mimg)
      Set the moving image
      void setMovingMask(T mimg_mask)
      Optional - set the moving image mask
      void setRegistrationParameters(Map<String,String> parameters)
      Is called before registration to pass any extra registration parameter argument.
      void setScijavaContext(Context context)
      Is called just after the Registration object creation to pass the current scijava context is adopted by all registrations
      void setTimePoint(int timePoint)
      Sets the timepoint of the source that should be used for the registration.
      void setTransform(String serialized_transform)
      Function used to bypass the real registration process (run) in order to set directly the result of the registration.

    • Method Detail

      • setScijavaContext

        void setScijavaContext(Context context)
        Is called just after the Registration object creation to pass the current scijava context is adopted by all registrations
        Parameters:
        context -

      • setRegistrationParameters

        void setRegistrationParameters(Map<String,String> parameters)
        Is called before registration to pass any extra registration parameter argument. Passed as a dictionary of String to preserve serialization capability.
        Parameters:
        parameters - dictionary of parameters

      • getRegistrationParameters

        Map<String,String> getRegistrationParameters()
        For serialization and reproducibility
        Returns:
        parameters that were used for the registration

      • setFixedImage

        void setFixedImage(T fimg)
        Sets the fixed image
        Parameters:
        fimg - fixed image

      • setMovingImage

        void setMovingImage(T mimg)
        Set the moving image
        Parameters:
        mimg - moving image

      • setFixedMask

        void setFixedMask(T fimg_mask)
        Optional - sets the fixed image mask
        Parameters:
        fimg_mask - fixed image

      • setMovingMask

        void setMovingMask(T mimg_mask)
        Optional - set the moving image mask
        Parameters:
        mimg_mask - moving image

      • resetRegistration

        void resetRegistration()
        Sets the state of the registration to not done Called when the registration needs to be rerun for real instead of just restored

      • setTimePoint

        void setTimePoint(int timePoint)
        Sets the timepoint of the source that should be used for the registration. 0 in most cases
        Parameters:
        timePoint -

      • register

        boolean register()
        Blocking function which performs the registration
        Returns:
        true if the registration was run succesfully

      • getExceptionMessage

        default String getExceptionMessage()
        Can be called after register() return false in order to get a more meaningful explanation
        Returns:
        an error message for a failed registration

      • edit

        boolean edit()
        Blocking function which is called when the user wants to manually edit the result of the registration
        Returns:
        true is the transform is been edited successfully. If not, the previous state of the registration is restored thanks to the serialization of the transform. An edition cannot occur if the transform has not been set before (either via the run method, or via setting the transform via the setTransform(String) method

      • isRegistrationDone

        boolean isRegistrationDone()
        Flag functions which serves to know whether the result of the registration is available. Should not be blocking.
        Returns:
        true if the transform is available

      • getTransformedImageMovingToFixed

        T getTransformedImageMovingToFixed(T img)
        Function which takes an input moving image, transform it according to the result of the registration (transformation), and returns it
        Parameters:
        img - should not be modified
        Returns:
        the transformed image

      • getTransformedPtsFixedToMoving

        ch.epfl.biop.java.utilities.roi.types.RealPointList getTransformedPtsFixedToMoving(ch.epfl.biop.java.utilities.roi.types.RealPointList pts)
        Reverse transforms a list of points. This function takes a list of points given in the fixed coordinates system, inverse transform their coordinates according to the result of the registration. The points can be mutated
        Parameters:
        pts - points to transform from fixed to moving system coordinates
        Returns:
        the transformed points

      • abort

        void abort()
        Function called when a registration is cancelled while being processed

      • getTransform

        String getTransform()
        This function is used to: - save the registration into a json file - store transiently the state of a registration to cancel the edition of a transform, if needed
        Returns:
        a serialized representation of the transform as a String

      • setTransform

        void setTransform(String serialized_transform)
        Function used to bypass the real registration process (run) in order to set directly the result of the registration. This is used when: - loading a registration from a state file - restore if needed a previous transformed state after an edition a serialized representation of the transform is sent, leading to an immediate registration being done isDone should return true after this function is being called
        Parameters:
        serialized_transform -

      • getTransformAsRealTransform

        RealTransform getTransformAsRealTransform()
        If the transform can be returned as a serializable RealTransform object, this can be used to serialize the successive registrations as a RealTransformSequence object, or even, if all transformations are invertible, as a InvertibleRealTransformSequence object
        Returns:

      • getRegistrationTypeName

        default String getRegistrationTypeName()
        Used for serialisation
        Returns:
